root.name: Insurgency 2
root.description: Overview:Insurgency 2 is the follow-up to the original Insurgency--a class-based tactical shooter, built as a Half Life mod, that emphasized realistic-feeling weapons, sound effects, and damage models. Insurgency 2 marks the game becoming a standalone product, built on Valve's Source engine, and includes changes such as the "Light, Medium, and Heavy" body loadouts. The game is currently in Alpha, and is available for pre-purchase on the game's official website.
